title: Legacy Beats Lust
verse_text: A good man leaves an inheritance for his children’s children.
insight: Lust promises quick reward and long regret.
Legacy builds slow but leaves eternal impact.
one_minute_win: Name one thing today that builds legacy, not lust. Do it.
declaration: I’m a legacy builder, not a moment chaser.
related_devotionals: Psalm 127:3 Devotional - Children Are a Heritage
